    • Constructor Detail

      • SimplePlayback

        public SimplePlayback()
        Instantiates a new simple playback. Sets pathToFile to null. In order to play back a file the user needs to specify a path to a file

      • SimplePlayback

        public SimplePlayback(java.lang.String path)
        Instantiates a new simple playback. Sets pathToFile. If it is a valid path, you can play back the file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file

    • Method Detail

      • playWav

        public void playWav()
        Play a '.wav' formatted file.

      • playWav

        public void playWav(java.lang.String pathToFile)
        Play a '.wav' formatted file. With a different path than the currently set path. If you use the default SimplePlayback() then you can use this to at once set the pathToFile and play.
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - the path to file

      • pauseWav

        public void pauseWav()
        Pause '.wav' formatted play back.

      • resumeWav

        public void resumeWav()
        Resume '.wav' formatted play back.

      • playMp3

        public void playMp3()
        Play '.mp3' formatted file.

      • playMp3

        public void playMp3(java.lang.String pathToFile)
        Play a '.mp3' formatted file. With a different path than the currently set path. If you use the default SimplePlayback() then you can use this to at once set the pathToFile and play.
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - the path to file

      • getFileToPlay

        public java.io.File getFileToPlay()
        Gets the file that you are playing.
        Returns:
        the file that you are playing

      • stopMp3

        public void stopMp3()
        Stop mp3 playback.

      • stopWav

        public void stopWav()
        Stop wav playback.

      • play

        public void play()
        Play. A method that takes the pathToFile and assesses its format (if it ends in .wav or .mp3) then plays that file.

      • play

        public void play(java.lang.String pathToFile)
        Play. A method that takes the pathToFile and assesses its format (if it ends in .wav or .mp3) then plays that file. Takes in the path to the desired content.
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - the path to file
